about_the_game:
The To Trust an Incubus Original Sound Track includes 37 exclusive tracks including: Game Songs, Voice Snippets, a Blooper Reel from some of the Voice Actors, and Songs that Didn't Make it Into the Game. This sound track is for the To Trust an Incubus game, releasing on November 23rd.

1. Newswoman's Voice
2. Portal Music
3. Kenta's Voice
4. Kenta Music
5. Raiden's Voice
6. You Screwed Up
7. Vald's Voice
8. Vald Music
9. Harsi's Voice
10. Harsi Music
11. Arata's Voice
12. Bad Ending Music
13. Devi's Voice
14. Devi Music
15. Saji's Voice
16. Saji Music
17. Chiyoko's Voice
18. Chiyoko's Music
19. Emily's Voice
20. Arata Music
21. Lysander Voice
22. Raiden Music
23. News Music
24. MiniGame Music
25. The Woods are Lovely Music
26. Rough Sex Music
27. Confused Music
28. Hurt Music
29. Tension Music
30. Jungle Sex Music
31. Joke Music
32. Saji Variant Music (Not in Game)
33. Devi Variant Music (Not in Game)
34. I Don't Think So Music (Not in Game)
35. Kenta Variant Music (Not in Game)
36. Matt's Voice
37. Blooper Reel

Once you purchase and install/download the Sound Track in the DLC list of To Trust an Incubus in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (To Trust an Incubus) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the sound track in this folder.

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
